definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
(of a check etc) to cash/to honor a commitment
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
to arrange (colloquial)/to transfer creditor's rights (in a debt case)
to cash/to change gold or silver into money

sentences.english: It would help us greatly if you would accept D/A.
sentences.chinese: 若贵方能接收承兑交单方式付款，则兑偶方帮忙很大。

sentences.english: That is in turn buttressing the euro against the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 这也支撑了欧元兑美元走高。

sentences.english: The rate for traveler's cheques is 300 yuan against 100 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 旅行支票的兑换率是100美圆兑300元。

sentences.english: You like the taste of Green Tea and Chivas .
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢绿茶兑芝华士的味道。

sentences.english: The Indian rupee has appreciated about 4 percent against the dollar so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年以来印度卢比兑美元已升值了约4%。

sentences.english: Sterling hit 31-year lows against the U. S. dollar this week.
sentences.chinese: 英镑兑美元本周触及31年低点。

sentences.english: He pays close attention to the floating exchange rate of the NTD.
sentences.chinese: 他在密切关注新台币兑美元的浮动汇率。

sentences.english: Could you lend me 2000 Yuan now?
Studies the pricing of covered warrants on correlation between returns and volatility.
sentences.chinese: 研究标的股票收益与波动率相关下的备兑权证定价。

sentences.english: We hereby added out confirmation to this credit.
sentences.chinese: 我行因此给该信用证加具保兑。

sentences.english: Can you change this hundred-yuan note?
sentences.chinese: 你能兑这张百元纸币吗？

sentences.english: Please note that we have added our confirmation to the above L/C, negotiation is restricted to ourselves only.
sentences.chinese: 上述信用证已经由我行加具保兑，并限向我行交单。

sentences.english: The pound fell to a 23-year low against the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 英镑兑美元汇率跌至23年低点。

sentences.english: EUR/USD has been holding on its sufficient resistance to block euro from flying away.
sentences.chinese: 欧元兑美元在高保位持着绝对优势的阻力。

definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
bucket/(trash) can/barrel (of oil etc)/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing earth/female principle/☷/ancient Chinese compass point: 225° (southwest)
to cash/to change gold or silver into money
Baishui county in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi
to convert into/to amount to/to be equivalent to
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
